name: Stifled Air
description: The air is stale and stifled.

name: Calm
description: The air is warm and still.

name: Distant Rain
description: You can hear the rain falling outside.

name: Distant Storm
description: You can hear the cracks of thunder outside.

name: Claustrophobic
description: The air is tightly packed and feels dense.

name: Dusty
description: You can see motes of dust crowding the air.

name: Earthy
description: You smell earthy tones and taste grit against your lips.

name: Rocky
description: You smell earthy tones and taste grit against your lips.

name: Overgrown
description: Spores, pollen and plant life surge into your nostrils.
